mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (member_userId, name, bookDate, bookTime, personnel) VALUES (#{member_userId}, #{name}, #{bookDate}, #{bookTime}, #{personnel})
mapper.select: SELECT number, member_userId, name, bookDate, bookTime, personnel FROM book WHERE number = #{number}
SELECT number, member_userId, name, bookDate, bookTime, personnel FROM book WHERE member_userId = #{member_userId} GROUP BY number ORDER BY number DESC
